headline: Jim Cramer on Whirlpool: “A Dividend Cut Means Don’t Buy”
summary: Whirlpool Corporation (NYSE:WHR) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer was focused on recently. During the episode, a caller inquired about the stock, noting that it has a 4% yield and is near its 52-week low. In response, Cramer said: “Whirlpool, it’s kinda like the Bengals. Look, there’s just not enough, the balance sheet’s not […]
